instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: 820-2915 no CPU
threads.message:
Hello,

i just received 2 units MBP 820-2915 and both have the same symptom.
Fan spins, No chime, no USB activity, No Capslock. Vcore 0.78V. when removed RAM, it beeps. same with SMC Bypass mode.
I know GPU dies alot for this modal but what are the other usual suspects?

threads.title: 820-2915 no CPU
threads.message:
CPU core looks good, like booted board.
I can suspect CPU gets blocked because of bad GPU.

Disable GPU and check what happens then.

threads.title: 820-2915 no CPU
threads.message: Can confirm after disable GPU Macbook boots thanks!
